item.title: Events at U of T
Team
item.description: Damien Boltauzer Damien is an undergraduate in Anthropology at the Department for the Study of Religion at the University of Toronto. He has a deep interest in religious/sacred spaces and geographies in the Himalayan Buddhist world. He has conducted research with the KCC in Sikkim and also in Ladakh, and he is now studying for a year in Kathmandu. Anna Balikci Denjongpa Anna has a Ph.D. in Anthropology from the School of Oriental and African Studies.
